profile.name: Sam Stephenson
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at Snowflake | Database Sharding Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for database sharding and modern web development. Proficient in multiple programming languages, including Ruby, TypeScript, and JavaScript.
profile.company:
Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following employer for Sam Stephenson:

Snowflake

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Snowflake
description: Designed and implemented a high-performance database sharding system for large-scale applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy scalable web applications using modern technologies like TypeScript and React.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects, including a DNS server for Node.js and a Ruby library for finding files in a set of paths.
Provided freelance services to clients, delivering high-quality software solutions on time and within budget.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of multiple open-source projects, including a Rack application for serving static sites.
Participated in code reviews and ensured that all contributions adhered to high standards of quality and maintainability.
